roguehouseguide-text:
Rogue House Community Server Guide Your Journey Begins... Join the Discord! - Vintage Story Wiki Welcome to Rogue House! Here, we are addicted to chiseling and can stop whenever we want, but we choose not to. We also enjoy immersive survival gameplay with lots of creativity used in building and community play. There are no commands for teleports, no /home, /back or /spawn.
Starter Guide - Progression Guide - Claims Guide - Chat Group Guide Settings:
-75% Hunger Speed
-75% Food Spoilage
-Base HP Set to 15
-Items stored in a Player Corpse on Death
-30 Days per Month
-1 Game Day is 96 Minutes (Default 48)
-Calender Paused When Empty
-Chiseling for Most Blocks
-Rifts Enabled
-Rare Temporal Storms
-Wind Affects Entities
-Underground Farming Enabled
-Proximity Chat Tab With RP Features
-General Chat Linked to Discord RogueRaiden: Server Owner & Builder MorwenAbendstern: Server Admin & Builder Help keep the server running with Ko-fi! Expanded claims available with monthly Memberships :D
roguehouse-clientmodlist-text: Client Mods Permitted For Use Due to cheat mods on the mod database and users caught using said cheat mods, these are the only allowed client mods on Rogue House Servers. Attempting to use others will prevent you from joining. Direct any client mod requests to our Discord. 01. Accessibility Tweaks - Allows adjusting of nearly every sound and visual effect and more to help in all kinds of ways. Pickaxe sound on rock too loud? Piercing wolf howls? Turn them down! Open the menu with default F8. 02. Auto Walk - Adds a keybind for auto walking. 03. Body Heat Bar - HUD element that shows when your character is getting cold. 04. Campaign Cartographer - All sorts of waypoint and minimap utilities and tools. 05. Emote Menu - Press the default key 'K' to open a radial menu with all of the game emotes available! 06. Simple Hud Clock - Adds a clock to the hud with helpful information. 07. Interfaces And Rainbows - Allows customizing the colors of your inventory screens. 08. Mumble Link - Positional audio plugin for Mumble. We'll have a Mumble Roleplay server soon! 09. Natural Night - Adjusts the ambient color of dawn, dusk and night time from the crazy red to a more realistic blue. 10. Pixel Waypoints - Replaced the vanilla waypoint icons with more visible, pixelated ones. 11. Prospector Info - Keeps track of each chunk you prospect on the map. 12. Room Indicator - HUD element that shows what type of room you are in. 13. Target Dot - This retextures the very large 'plus' crosshair with a much smaller 'dot' crosshair. (Both Small and Medium are allowed) 14. Temperature Scales - Allows displaying temperatures in Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin. 15. Temporal Storm Gear - The 'Sanity Gear' meter in the middle will turn rusty when a storm is near. 16. Xandus Inventory Tweaks - A collection of small tweaks to improve the inventory handling.
roguehouse-servermodlist-text: Rogue House Mod List 01. A Culinary Artillery - Library mod adding all the tools and features for enhanced foods and recipes. 02. Ancient Tools - Mod adding new crafting systems and fancy carts. 03. Beehive Kiln - Large kiln to smelt many items. 04. Bricklayers - Utilizing Expanded Matter, this adds tons of colorful clay and glass blocks along with many decor items. Let your creativity flow! 05. Bullseye - Overhauled Ranged combat with a new aiming system, roles for bows, obsidian & bamboo arrows, iron & steel spears and more! 06. Calendar - Simple paper Calendar to hang on the wall that shows the current Month and Day at a glance. 07. CaN Market - Adds shop blocks for buying/selling. 08. Carry On - Crouch + hold right click with both hands empty to pick up chests, vessels, crates and other things. Do the same action without targeting a block to place some blocks on your back with a speed penalty. 09. Cats - Utilizes Pet AI to add in several tameable cats with a couple accessories. 10. Chisel Tools - Iron Tier tools for significant Quality of Life features for chiselers. 11. CommonLib - Library mod for DArkHekRoMaNT's mods. 12. Doff And Don Again - Quality of Life keybinds to quickly place your armor onto an armor stand, take from the armor stand or toss onto the ground. 13. Expanded Matter - Library mod adding lots of basic resources and ways to obtain them. 14. Expanded Foods - Utilizes A Culinary Artillery to greatly increase the available food dishes and recipes for them. 15. Instruments - Pick one up and start playing some music! Uses ABC files just like Starbound or LOTR: Online to play music in-game. The server has a collection of music loaded, but the mod can also load files locally. 16. Joy of Sailing - Adds sailboats with working sail! 17. Mr Mannequin - A mannequin to display your clothes! 18. Meteoric Expansion - Watch meteor showers streak through the sky, individually or in clusters. Individual meteors that crash down will destroy unprotected blocks and imbed an ore rich meteor into the area. 19. More Roofing - More roofing blocks out of a selection of materials. 20. Pet AI - Library mod for taming creatures as Pets or Mounts. 21. Player Corpse - Stashes your items into a humanoid skeleton on death with a map waypoint. 22. Pottery Wheel - A spinning wheel to make pottery with! 23. Primitive Survival - Forms of fishing, animal traps, fireworks, earth worms.. This mod has a bit of everything. 24. Rogue House Additions - Custom mod for the Rogue House server. Utilizes the Pet AI and Expanded Matter libraries. Extra creatures, pets, decoritive blocks, clothing, tons of tweaks and much more! 25. Scarecrow - Simple scarecrow that keeps some animals away from your crops. 26. Simple Wind Direction - Enables random wind direction that affects entities. 27. Spyglass - Craftable item for getting a close look at things. 28. Simple Elevator (Currently Outdated) - Adds Elevator blocks for quickly getting up and down. 29. Stone Bake Oven - Multiblock oven for baking! 30. Stone Quarry - Use metal plugs to quarry stone in large slabs to take materials from later. 31. Teleportation Runes - An item based 'warp' system. Craft the rune, bind it to a Beacon, then use the Rune to travel back to the bound location. 32. VSQuest - Framework for adding quest giving entities. 33. Wildcraft - Adds in all sorts of herbs and poultices. 34. Wild Farming Revival - Expansion to farming mechanics such as growing trees, spreading forests, growth of mushrooms, seaweed and vines plus some more. 35. Wolf Taming - Utilizes Pet AI to tame wolf pups and domesticate them into dogs. Includes some armor and accessories. 36. xLib - Library mod for skill systems. 37. xSkills - Utilizes xLib for a full Skill Tree. Earn experience for a skill by performing actions under the skill. Get Ability Points on leveling the skill. Distribute your Ability Points to a skill's perks and gain powerful abilities!
